tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE traffic_violations (
  violation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_id UUID NOT NULL,
  violation_date DATE NOT NULL,
  violation_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  violation_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  violation_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE traffic_violations (
  violation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  violation_date DATE,
  violation_type VARCHAR(50),
  vehicle_registration VARCHAR(20),
  violation_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE violators (
  violator_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  address VARCHAR(100),
  license_number VARCHAR(20),
  phone_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE traffic_violations (
  violation_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_plate_number VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  violation_type VARCHAR(100),
  violation_date DATE,
  fine_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE violation_locations (
  location_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  location_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  city VARCHAR(50),
  state VARCHAR(50),
  country VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE violators (
  violator_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  last_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  dob DATE,
  driver_license_number VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE traffic_violations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    violation_type VARCHAR(50),
    vehicle_license_plate VARCHAR(20),
    violation_date DATE,
    violation_location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE violators (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    address VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    driving_license_number VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE officers (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    badge_number VARCHAR(10),
    department VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE violations_history (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    violator_id INT,
    officer_id INT,
    violation_id INT,
    violation_date DATE,
    violation_notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE traffic_violations (
  violation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  license_plate VARCHAR(255),
   driver_name VARCHAR(255),
  violation_type VARCHAR(255),
  violation_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE violation_locations (
  location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  violation_id INT,
  location_name VARCHAR(255),
  city VARCHAR(255),
  state VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE violation_officers (
  officer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  officer_name VARCHAR(255),
  badge_number VARCHAR(255),
  department VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE violation_penalties (
  penalty_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  violation_id INT,
  fine_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  points_given INT
)

CREATE TABLE violation_images (
  image_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  violation_id INT,
  image_url VARCHAR(255),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)
